General.Name: Yungshin Construction & Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Yungshin Construction & Development Co.,Ltd. constructs and sells residential and commercial buildings for leasing and selling in Taiwan. It also trades in building materials; provides residential and commercial interior decoration services. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Chen-Ling  Yu
1.Title: Internal Audit Officer & Principal Accounting Officer
